defaultText:
Admin -- Updated September
====================
Confluence -- {{ pullCustDB.data.find(row => row.Account === Select1.selectedOptionValue).confluence_page }}

Service Types -- {{ [...new Set( pullBillingData.data .filter(row => row.account_number === Select1.selectedOptionValue) .map(row => row.service_type_narrative) )].join(', ') }}

Billed Numbers -- {{ pullCustDB.data .find(row => row.Account === Select1.selectedOptionValue) .numbers .replaceAll('|', ' - ') }}

====================
GEN1 -- Account Status = {{ (!policyView.tableData || policyView.tableData.length === 0) ? 'No Account Found' : (policyView.tableData.every(row => row.active !== 'enabled')) ? 'Disabled Account' : (policyView.tableData.some(row => row.active !== 'enabled')) ? 'Partially Disabled Policy' : 'Enabled' }}
- Sites -- {{ getNtwkData.data.find(row => row.account_no === Select1.selectedOptionValue).Site1}}, {{ getNtwkData.data.find(row => row.account_no === Select1.selectedOptionValue).Site2}}

====================
IVP -- Account Status = {{ manipTable.tableData.find(row => row.ivp_externalid === updateExIDCopy.text)?.ivp_accountstatus || 'No Account Found' }}
- IVP Service ID -- {{ pullCustDB.data.find(row => row.Account === Select1.selectedOptionValue).ivp_externalid }}

- ACL List (All Services) --
{{ manipTable.tableData.find(row => row.ivp_externalid === updateExIDCopy.text).ACL }}

- Default CLI -- {{ getIVPServices.data.filter(row => row.externalid === updateExIDCopy.text).map(row => `${row["name"]} (${row["Default Outbound CLI"]})`).join(', ') }}

- Media Bypass -- {{ getIVPServices.data.find(row => row.externalid === updateExIDCopy.text)["Enable Media Bypass"]}}

- Channels -- {{ getIVPServices.data.filter(row => row.externalid === updateExIDCopy.text).map(row => `${row["name"]} (${row["Number of channels"]})`).join(', ') }}
